about_the_game:
Time Breaking: Dino Breach is an isometric survival horror experience designed as the spiritual successor to Dino Crisis.

With gameplay that echoes the intense survival dynamics and tension of the classic Dino Crisis, Time Breaking: Dino Breach offers a mix of action, puzzle-solving and moments of pure suspense as you explore claustrophobic research centers and prehistoric jungles populated by deadly dinosaurs.

Key Gameplay Features:

  • Live the gripping and emotional story of Kate: Step into the role of Kate, a R.O.P.E soldier who travels back in time to change the tragic fate of a person she deeply loves.

  • Explore dangerous environments: Navigate hostile prehistoric jungles and claustrophobic research centers in search of resources, weapons, and key items that can mean the difference between life and death.

  • Face deadly dinosaurs: Engage in tense and fear-filled battles with dangerous dinosaurs whose behaviors are inspired by those found in Dino Crisis. Use your wits and carefully manage limited ammunition to defeat them.

  • Solve puzzles and riddles: Solve puzzles and environmental riddles to progress, unlock weapon upgrades, and find useful tools to survive the ravenous dinosaurs.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore.

name: Time Breaking: Dino Breach - Demo
short_description: Time Breaking: Dino Breach is an isometric survival horror experience designed as the spiritual successor to Dino Crisis. Experience the desperate struggle of Kate Jeong, a woman who goes back in time, facing dangerous dinosaurs, determined to change the fate of someone she loves deeply.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
